verses.verse: These are the deuisyons of the sonnes of Aaron: The sonnes of Aaron: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar & Ithamar.
Nadab also and Abihu dyed before theyr father, & had no chyldren. But Eleazar and Ithamar executed the prestes offyce.
And Dauid ordered them on this maner: Zadock of the sonnes of Eleazar, & Abimelek of the sonnes of Ithamar were according to theyr offyces in theyr ministracyon.

And there were mo auncient men founde amonge the sonnes of Eleazar, then the sonnes of Ithamar. And thus were they ordred together: Amonge the sonnes of Eleazar there were syxtene rulers, accordynge to the housholde of their fathers: & eyght among the sonnes of Ithamar according to the houshold of theyr fathers.
And thus were they put in order by lott, the one sorte from the other, & so were there rulers in the Sanctuarye & Lordes before God, as well of the sonnes of Ithamar as of the sonnes of Eleazar.

And Simeia the sonne of Nathaneel the Scribe, of the kynred of the Leuites wrote them before the kyng and the Lordes, & before Zadock the preast and Abimeleck the sonne of Abiathar, and before the auncient fathers, before the preastes & the Leuites: one principall houshold beyng reserued for Eleazar and one for Ithamar.
And the fyrst lot fell to Iehoiarib, & the seconde to Iedaia.
The thirde to Harim, & the fourth to Schorim.
The fyfte to Melchia, & the syxte to Miamin.
The seuenth to Hakos, & the eyght to Abia.
The nynthe to Iesua, & the tenth to Secamahu.
The leuenth to Eliasib, & the twelueth to Iakim.
The thirtenth to Hupa, & the fourtenth to Iesebeab.
The fiftenth to Bisga, & the syxtenth to Immer.
The seuententh to Hezir, & the eyghtenth to Hapzez.
The nynetenth to Pathahia, and the twentieth to Ieheskel.
The twentieth & one to Iachin and the . xxij. to Gamul.
The . xxiij. to Delaiahu, and the . xxiiij. to Maasiahu.
These are the ordinaunces of them in their offices, whan they came into the house of the Lorde, accordyng to their maner vnder Aaron their father, as the Lorde God of Israel had commaunded hym.
The rest of the sonnes of Leui, are these: of the sonnes of Amram, Subael. Of the sonnes of Subael, Iehediahu.
Of the sonnes of Rehabia, the fyrst Iesia.
Of the Iezaharites, Selomoth. Of the sonnes also of Selomoth, Iahath.
His sonnes Ieriahu the first Amariahu the seconde, Iahaziel the thirde, & Iekameam the fourth.
Of the sonnes of Usiel, Micha. Of the sonnes of Micha, Samir.
The brother of Micha was Iisia. Of the sonnes also of Iisia Zechariahu.
The sonnes of Merari, were: Mahli & Musi. The sonnes of Iaaziahu, Beno.
The sonnes of Merari by Iahaziahu, Beno, Sohem, Zacur & Ibri.
Of Maheli came Eleazar & he had no sonnes.
Of kis: the sonnes of Kis: Ierahemeel.
The sonnes of Musi: Mahli, Eder and Ierimoth. These are the children of the Leuites after the housholde of their fathers.

And these cast lottes next to their brethren the sonnes of Aaron, in the presence of Dauid the kyng, and Zadoc & Ahimelec & the auncient fathers, preastes, & Leuites: euen the principall fathers before their yonger brethren.
